thread.title: CBS Cancels Extant " But There's Good News for Halle Berry
thread.title_full: CBS Cancels Extant " But There's Good News for Halle Berry

author: TV Guide
title: CBS Cancels Extant " But There's Good News for Halle Berry
text: Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 2:33 PM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 2:33 PM Cops with an image problem? No problem! On Sunday's episode of Brooklyn Nine-Nine , Captain Holt ( Andre Braugher ) thinks he has the perfect solution to the police's unsavory reputation: create a positive image campaign featuring NYPD's finest. Naturally, that brown-noser Amy Santiago ( Melissa Fumero ) will be the first detective featured. Amy will need a little coaching though (uptight much?), and Holt is here to help. What could possibly go wrong? Take a look: Brooklyn Nine-Nine airs Sundays at 8:30/7:30c on Fox. Other Links From TVGuide.com
